price: 18. Ya sólo, buku ya bato malamu ekozala o’kati ya iliyíne.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
